name: Spirit Run
description:
RELEASE YOUR INNER BEAST
Go through ancient rituals, transform your soul into an animal’s and help your brood defend the Aztec Temple from apocalypse!
Spirit Run is the road to awe that everybody should travel.

- Ten characters to choose from (each morphs into a unique temple creature)
- Transform into and run with Wolf, Fox, Bear, Panther, Panda and Unicorn
- NEW BigFoot and Deer characters
- NEW FallenWolf and LionKing heroes
- Epic landscapes and dynamic action
- Gorgeous graphics
- Protect the Ancient Aztec Temple
- Level-up your Spirit and run in search of Soul Energy Balance

From creators of undying Zombie Run game (over 20 million downloads on all platforms).

Universal binary.
